entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
